DOC.detailed_description: Subjective well-being positive state affair six domain life : interpersonal , community , occupational , physical , psychological , economic ( I COPPE ) . The purpose study evaluate effectiveness , feasibility , acceptability online intervention name Fun For Wellness ( FFW ) , design promote skills self-efficacy multidimensional I COPPE domains life . In design program consider press societal need promote universal health well-being prevent stress , illness disease . Preventable condition related lifestyle obesity stress afflict million people . Therefore , saw need develop universal tool adult population would comfortable online platform FFW . Universal program show effective , example , reduce mental health problem college student . While face-to-face intervention effective prevent serious condition , labor intensive limited reach . The ability prevent adverse condition enhance healthy behavior online intervention create several opportunity : accessibility , scalability , interactivity , affordability , fidelity implementation . A randomized control trial FFW intervention employee sample , find initial evidence effectiveness FFW intervention . Participants comply FFW intervention significantly higher subjective well-being , compare compliers Usual Care group , multiple I COPPE domain . For current study , well-being self-efficacy measure administer baseline ( T1 ) , 30 days-post baseline ( T2 ) 60 day -post baseline ( T3 ) . A maximum 500 patient enrol . Recruitment take place on-site IRB approve study flyer community medical center . All study activity take place entirely online secure website . Hypothesis 1 : Outcome effect : The online well-being program effective usual care condition improving : 1 ) overall well-being 2 ) domain well-being , 3 ) health relate quality life ( HRQOL ) time . Hypothesis 2 : Self-efficacy effect : The online well-being program effective usual care condition improve I COPPE well-being self-efficacy . Hypothesis 3 : Mediating effect : The effect online well-being program on- 1 ) overall well-being , 2 ) domain well-being , 3 ) health relate quality life partially mediate improvement I COPPE well-being self-efficacy time .
